channel.title: Felix Krusch - Web Design & Development Blog
channel.description: Insights on web design, development, SEO, and digital strategy from Felix Krusch, freelance web designer and developer based in Montreal.

item.title: Why 85% of Cleaning Companies & Janitor Websites Scare Off Customers in 2026
item.description: The hard truth: Slow loading times, unclear prices, missing forms, fake images, no reviews, mobile issues. A simple one-pager fixes 80% and brings more inquiries. No agency needed.

item.title: Freelancers Obliterate Agencies for SMEs in 2026 - Wake Up
item.description: Small/midsize businesses are getting robbed by agencies charging 3-4x more for the same work. Freelancers deliver 90-110% quality for 30-60% of the price with faster delivery.

item.title: Noise drowns signal, people tune out
item.description: If the platform's filtering cannot surface scarce human signal effectively, noise drowns signal and people tune out. But when filtering works well, genuine personal content becomes disproportionately valuable.

item.title: You don't need a CMS anymore
item.description: Not for blogs, not for small e-commerce, not for company sites. Security concerns, page builder drag, wasted time. Write in one language, polish automatically, translate . Serve clean and fast.
